# primaryAction

**Instance Property**

The action associated with the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var primaryAction: UIAction? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When you assign a new value to this property, the title and image of the item update to match the primary action’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAction/title] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAction/image].

If this property has a non-`nil` value, the system ignores the item’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/target] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem/action] properties.

## Managing the action

- **changesSelectionAsPrimaryAction**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button represents an action or selection.
- **action**: The selector defining the action message to send to the target object when the user taps this bar button item.
- **target**: The object that receives an action when the user selects the item.
